features: HD WEBCAM WITH MICROPHONE: The TALK WORKS web camera with built-in dual microphone input is an ideal solution for adding a camera to your desktop monitor as well as laptop for improved HD quality. It is lightweight, compact, and easy to install.

COMPACT CONVENIENCE: Great for travel and video conferences, this web cam is lightweight and compact for easy storage so you can take it on business trips as well around your home office or for streaming and gaming.

HIGH DEFINITION QUALITY: Our 1080p camera has a large window capture size with high resolution COMS color sensors and built-in image compression with automatic brightness adjustment and color compensation.

EASY TO USE: This external webcam includes a 5ft USB-A cable - uses USB-C connection with no drivers needed and built-in dual microphone input for high quality voice and sound. Use for a variety of occasions - conferences, streaming camera, and gaming.

ABOUT US: TALK WORKS offers tech accessories that make our lives easier and more enjoyable. Our products include phone charging accessories, gaming accessories, charging cables, power banks, and much more.
body.description: The TALK WORKS web camera with built-in dual microphone input is an ideal solution for adding a camera to your desktop monitor as well as laptop for improved HD quality. It is lightweight, compact, and easy to install. Great for travel and video conferences, this web cam is lightweight and compact for easy storage so you can take it on business trips as well around your home office or for streaming and gaming. Our 1080p camera has a large window capture size with high resolution COMS color sensors and built-in image compression with automatic brightness adjustment and color compensation. Includes a 5ft USB-A cable - uses USB-C connection with no drivers needed and built-in dual microphone input for high quality voice and sound. Use for a variety of occasions - conferences, streaming camera, gaming, and more.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.9 3.9 out of 5 stars 149 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, cheap, works great
reviews.reviewText: Works great for the price you pay, not sure if there’s audio with it because I’ve been using my headphones. Bought it for my Xbox series x to start live streaming, it works GREAT for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to beat the value on this camera
reviews.reviewText: I was in a bind when my external camera that I use nearly all day every day just decided to die. My laptop camera wasn't going to cut it because it sits at a strange angle (ah yes, the realities of having to create a makeshift office in a guest room lol). This camera just worked as soon as I plugged it in and I didn't have to do much of anything to it. It anchored on my monitor just as well as my other camera, had a long cable which was very helpful, and did what it should. It's also pretty compact if you need to move it or take it with you somewhere.I use headphones when on calls so I didn't test out the mic. However, the picture quality was fine. Was it the absolute best ever? No, but what do you expect at this price point? Frankly, I think a slightly lower quality webcam is better these days as it hides the fact I didn't put on a full face of makeup and may have some blemishes. haha The lighting in my makeshift office changes from good to terrible throughout the day (I generally don't turn other lights on if I can avoid it) and this camera seemed to handle it with minimal issues. Any camera is going to struggle with weird shadows and overly dark areas but this one performed similar to others in that department as well.The main thing I don't like about it is that it doesn't have a lens cover which I wasn't a fan of. It didn't claim to so I'm not knocking it for that but that would be a great feature and pretty much make it perfect if you're looking for a basic set of features on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Fix For Broken Camera
reviews.reviewText: The lense on my laptop camera had been damaged somehow but I still have to do the occasional Zoom meeting. This worked perfectly for that purpose with litttle fuss on my part.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Absolute garbage. The picture was so blurry straight out of the box that you couldn't even make out any shapes or colors. Then I put it away to deal with it later and now it doesn't even turn on, no video, all black.Don't waste your money on this scam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was part of a gift for my nephew- he loves it
reviews.reviewText: This was part of a gift for my nephew. He loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: For online school n zoom meetings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars No Frills, No Thrills Cam
reviews.reviewText: Very poor quality, I had a similar camera that went out and I tried to replace it with this one that looked identical. The quality is horrible, the image is very pixelated, doesn't pick up accurate colors, and obscures colors and images. Either too bright or too dark, and even when focusing the image, it is not as clear as my previous camera. Sending it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works on Windows and Ubuntu, but product description seems inaccurate
reviews.reviewText: Works immediately after just plugging it in. Tried both Window 10 or an Ubuntu 16.x machines, no issues. For the image quality, please check the attached picture, it was taken while the camera is on top of the monitor about 2 feet in front of me. The default image size captured is 640x360. I could not find a way to adjust anything in the default camera applications. I also made video recordings, they are:- Vp8 encoded- resolution of 640x360- frame rate of 25- BT601 color range- Audio is Mono 44100, 80kb/s.I did not find any ways to make the resolution any higher, while the device description states 1080p, that should be 1920x1080, while I only get 640x360. The camera applications should be able to adjust the resolution, but the only listed value is 640x360 on my side.The audio is described as dual microphone, that seems false, it only records mono audio. I could not find a way to adjust this either.The other incorrect detail in the listing is: "This external webcam includes a 5ft USB-A cable - uses USB-C connection". The cable is attached to the camera, the other end is USB-A. There is absolutely noting USB-C on this device.The focus is manually adjustable, works well. All in all, this camera works better than my previous cheap webcams, the image had wide enough angle, the brightness is fine. I would be only disappointed if I was looking for a camera based on the description, as the text seems to be inaccurate about the details.UPDATE:On Windows, I can adjust the options in the camera application to increase the resolution to up to 1080p 25 fps. Adding back the 4th star of the rating. Unfortunately, I could not find a similar solution yet for ubuntu for my team meetings.
